Articles.Content: I've successfully made the short profile nerva in the tutorial, but a lot of posted stock ssto craft have dozens of air intakes stacked on top of each other with a high degree of overlap. When I try to reverse engineer these craft in the SPH, one click picks up 20-some parts that refuse to reattach. So how are those parts clipped like that?
Alt+F12 in-game opens the debug menu, which has some tools, including the "allow part clipping" button.
